label.value: ${eval(#{eval( ${CL([type])}:  ${get([title])} ${CL([issueType])} ${CL([priority])} ${CL([status])} ${if(${get([dueDate])}<>null).then( ${date([dueDate])} )} ${objectProperty(${get([assignee])})} ${objectProperty(${get([hasReporter])})} ${if(${get([references])}<>null).then( ${objectProperty(${get([references])})} )} ${get([emf:version])} ${user(${get([modifiedBy])})} ${date([modifiedOn])} ${if(${get([lockedBy])} <> null).then( ${objectProperty(${get([lockedBy])})} )} )})}

${eval(#{eval( ${CL([type])}:  ${get([title])} ${CL([issueType])} ${CL([priority])} ${CL([status])} ${if(${get([dueDate])}<>null).then( ${date([dueDate])} )} ${objectProperty(${get([assignee])})} ${objectProperty(${get([hasReporter])})} ${if(${get([references])}<>null).then( ${objectProperty(${get([references])})} )} ${get([emf:version])} ${user(${get([modifiedBy])})} ${date([modifiedOn])} ${if(${get([lockedBy])} <> null).then( ${objectProperty(${get([lockedBy])})} )} )})}
